Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Diabetic \Di`a*bet"ic\, Diabetical \Di`a*bet"ic*al\, a. Pertaining to diabetes; as, diabetic or diabetical treatment. --Quian. [1913 Webster]
{Diabetic sugar}. (Chem.) Same as {Dextrose}. ||
diabetic adj 1: of or relating to or causing diabetes 2: suffering from diabetes n : someone who has diabetes
